comment:
* A credential entry that is to be displayed on the account selector that is presented to the * user. * *

If user selects this entry, the corresponding {@link PendingIntent}, * set on the {@code slice} will be invoked to launch activities that require some user engagement * before getting the credential corresponding to this entry, e.g. authentication, * confirmation etc. The extras associated with the resulting {@link android.app.Activity} will * also contain the complete credential request containing all required parameters. This request * can be retrieved against {@link CredentialProviderService#EXTRA_GET_CREDENTIAL_REQUEST}. * * Once the activity fulfills the required user engagement, the {@link android.app.Activity} * result should be set to {@link android.app.Activity#RESULT_OK}, and the * {@link CredentialProviderService#EXTRA_GET_CREDENTIAL_RESPONSE} must be set with a * {@link GetCredentialResponse} object.

variables.name: mBeginGetCredentialOptionId
variables.comment: The request option that corresponds to this entry. *

variables.name: mType
variables.comment: The type of the credential entry to be shown on the UI.

variables.name: mSlice
variables.comment:
The object containing display content to be shown along with this credential entry
     * on the UI.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public String getBeginGetCredentialOptionId()
methods.comment:
* Returns the id of the {@link BeginGetCredentialOption} for which this credential
     * entry has been constructed.

methods.name: public String getType()
methods.comment: * Returns the specific credential type of the entry.

methods.name: public Slice getSlice()
methods.comment: * Returns the {@link Slice} object containing UI display content to be shown for this entry.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
